title: Revert "Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade"
body:
Dependencies update from arcade broke our builds: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=9780734&view=results
Reverting it to unblock the pipeline.

commit.message:
Revert "Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/arcade build 20240624.1 (#10285)"

This reverts commit b2d769c9f41a48f3a1218d925220d35bf38c1eb6.

nodes.body: There is an internal thread about this bug.
